Class TaskServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.cn.taskmanagement.service.usecase.TaskServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
TaskService
@Service public class TaskServiceImpl extends Object implements TaskService
Service implementation for managing Task entities.
